jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Overview : 

As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily GoLaundry & GoFix. We launched our app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now
jobsJson.description:
Overview :

As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily GoLaundry & GoFix. We launched our app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Act as a thought partner with the GoLife product team to discover and suggest new product functionality and optimize existing services and systems through Ad-hoc support
  • Ensure the best in-app user flows based on data-driven analysis
  • Build reports and reporting tools that marketing and product teams across the region use to help them make key decisions every day
  • Provide recommendations to improve services for our users and service providers, increase conversion rates, better allocation and more
  • Ability to work fast to find metrics and KPIs to determine Product-Market fit and establish this reporting in a fast, efficient manner

• 1 - 2+ years experience in the field 
  • Strong experience with a data visualization and dashboarding tool
  • Expert in SQL
  • Expert in Tableau
  • Fluent/experience in using Python or R as data analysis tool is a plus
  • Experience in ETL practice for data warehousing
  • Intensely curious and data-driven to make actionable product recommendations!
  • Background in statistics or computer science
  • Tools set: Strong SQL skills, Pentaho/Shell Scripting/other ETL tools and basic data modeling experience, Tableau or other Data Visualization tools, Metabase & Appsflyer/Clevertap
